desc: This category encompasses all portable electronic equipment that can be used for work or personal tasks. Examples include smartphones, laptops, tablets, and peripherals like keyboards and mice.
This category includes assets that are part of the underlying framework of technology systems. It covers network equipment (routers, switches), servers, storage devices, and backup systems.
Assets under this category involve physical or tangible assets used in the maintenance and operations of a physical space. This includes security systems, HVAC systems, lighting, and furniture.
